en.title: Breeder vs. Pet Shop | Which Is the Better Place to Get a Cat?
en.content:
Many people struggle with whether to purchase a cat from a breeder or a pet shop. Here is a comparison of each option\'s key characteristics.

Differences in Health Management

Reputable breeders conduct genetic testing on parent cats and manage the risk of hereditary diseases. They carefully examine each kitten\'s health and ensure proper vaccinations and deworming. With pet shops, it is often difficult to verify the health management practices of the supplying breeder.

Differences in Socialization

Kittens that have spent sufficient time with their mother and siblings at a breeder tend to be more sociable and friendly. At Fuluck Cattery, we conduct our own socialization training program to ensure a smooth transition to your home.

After-Sales Support

A major advantage of purchasing from a breeder is the ability to consult about care even after bringing your kitten home. You receive advice from an expert who specializes in that particular breed.

About Pricing

Breeders may be slightly more expensive, but it is important to evaluate the total value including health management, socialization, and after-sales support.

zh.title: 猫舍与宠物店的区别 | 买猫该选哪里？
zh.content:
迎接猫咪时，很多人会纠结是从猫舍还是宠物店购买。以下对比了两者的特点。

健康管理的区别

优质猫舍会对种猫进行基因检测，管理遗传性疾病的风险。会逐只仔细确认幼猫的健康状况，并妥善进行疫苗接种和驱虫。宠物店的实际情况是很难了解供货猫舍的管理状况。

社会化的区别

在猫舍与母猫和兄弟姐妹充分相处过的幼猫，往往社交能力更强、更亲人。福楽猫舍实施独特的社会化训练，确保接回家后的生活更加顺利。

售后支持

从猫舍购买的一大优势是，接猫后仍然可以获得饲养咨询。可以得到精通该猫种的专家建议。

关于价格

猫舍的价格可能略高，但重要的是综合考虑健康管理、社会化和售后支持的整体价值来做判断。
